#summary Instructions on how to compile JNAerator

Checkout the latest sources (you'll need SVN installed) : 
{{{ 
svn co http://jnaerator.googlecode.com/svn/ jnaerator
cd jnaerator
cd trunk
}}}

Run the compilation script :
 * On Windows :
  {{{ script/compile }}}
 * On Mac OS X, Linux and other Unices :
  {{{ sh scripts/compile }}}

That should be it, you'll be able to run JNAerator with the following command :
 * On Windows :
  {{{ java -cp libraries\anarres-cpp.jar;libraries\antlr-runtime-3.1.jar;libraries\jna.jar;libraries\junit-4.4.jar;classes com.ochafik.lang.jnaerator.JNAerator.java }}}
 * On Mac OS X, Linux and other Unices :
  {{{ java -cp ..\libraries\anarres-cpp.jar | tr "\n" ":"`:classes com.ochafik.lang.jnaerator.JNAerator.java }}}
